channel.title: Which of These Templates is Better?
channel.description:
I've been working on a new template for the server that I'm doing website development for ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,642510.0.html]World 901[/url]). The old template seemed to be to glossy and transparent, and wasn't my own work, so I spent about 20 minutes so far working on my own template. Let me know what you guys think is better. I was going for a more basic/professional look for the second template.
** ALSO, I haven't done anything what-so-ever to the nav in the second template, so yes, it looks shitty right now.
[b][size=14pt]Old Template:[/size][/b] [url=http://i39.tinypic.com/zuikhu.png]http://i39.tinypic.com/zuikhu.png[/url]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/zuikhu.png[/img]
[b][size=14pt]New Template:[/size][/b] [url=http://i39.tinypic.com/dqqghz.jpg]http://i39.tinypic.com/dqqghz.jpg[/url]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/dqqghz.jpg[/img]
Also, there is this one, from someone who wants to help me develop, I personally don't think it's too great, but take a look for yourselves. [url=http://zeanr.x10.mx/]http://zeanr.x10.mx/[/url]

item.title: Which of These Templates is Better?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

the black/blue clashes a great deal itself.

when designing any type of ui: pick a layout concept, pick a color scheme, then start development

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Zeanr, post:16, topic:527642”]So… are you guys saying mine than both of those? I’m confused from all the arguing, lol.[/quote]color clashes too much. overall design is ok. but colors need to be improved a hell of a lot.

item.title: Which of These Templates is Better?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“tigerclan, post:13, topic:527642”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=646396.msg4346973#msg4346973 date=1376024888]

Please quit asking for feedback if you can’t fudgeing handle it. You asked which template was better. He gave you his opinion and why. Learn to take criticism and gain from it, not get all butthurt

How can you gain anything at all from, “your templates suck.” Tell me that, if he was to say what he doesn’t like about them, and how I can improve, then I’ll be glad to take his feedback. Lay off your little butt buddy’s dick, if you don’t have ways to tell me how I can improve my template, get off the thread.

**OT:

I did give you feedback. A great deal towards the w901 template.

For this:
Nav bar - minimalistic, metro, decent
Main container - non metro (rounded corners clash) huge margin (waste of space) border (ugly tbh)
Small containers - uneven margins (suggest using a grid framework of some sort or learn better css) more rounded corners (creates “pop outs” and makes the elements look retarded and clashes with the whole page)

That’s all I’m typing for now cause I’m on my phone

Thank you.
[/quote]

Nowhere in this thread does he say “your template sucks.” So maybe you shouldn’t be using quotes like a complete imbecile. On top of that, I’ve never had a conversation with Vain, ever.

edit: The trees in the background don’t look that good, they don’t even have anything to do with RS, so I don’t see the point. It wouldn’t be that terrible if the sections overlaying them weren’t transparent. The red exclamation point portrays the wrong emotion, making you think that there is a problem with the server/page. Those are the only things I don’t like about it. (Also I never said I disliked it before you tripped out).[/quote]

I’m sorry, didn’t know you were talking about the first template. I agree, the first template is complete shit, with too many transparencies.

Read full topic
item.source: Which of These Templates is Better?

item.title: Which of These Templates is Better?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Your font choice is terrible and seems to be mixed. But yes, the first one seems more professionally done. Most of my templates come out as the second one, and mine are shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Which of These Templates is Better?
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:10, topic:527642”][quote author=tigerclan link=topic=646396.msg4346971#msg4346971 date=1376024656]
Please quit asking for feedback if you can’t fudgeing handle it. You asked which template was better. He gave you his opinion and why. Learn to take criticism and gain from it, not get all butthurt
[/quote]

How can you gain anything at all from, “your templates suck.” Tell me that, if he was to say what he doesn’t like about them, and how I can improve, then I’ll be glad to take his feedback. Lay off your little butt buddy’s dick, if you don’t have ways to tell me how I can improve my template, get off the thread.

**OT:

I did give you feedback. A great deal towards the w901 template.

For this:
Nav bar - minimalistic, metro, decent
Main container - non metro (rounded corners clash) huge margin (waste of space) border (ugly tbh)
Small containers - uneven margins (suggest using a grid framework of some sort or learn better css) more rounded corners (creates “pop outs” and makes the elements look retarded and clashes with the whole page)

That’s all I’m typing for now cause I’m on my phone

Thank you.[/quote]

Nowhere in this thread does he say “your template sucks.” So maybe you shouldn’t be using quotes like a complete imbecile. On top of that, I’ve never had a conversation with Vain, ever.

edit: The trees in the background don’t look that good, they don’t even have anything to do with RS, so I don’t see the point. It wouldn’t be that terrible if the sections overlaying them weren’t transparent. The red exclamation point portrays the wrong emotion, making you think that there is a problem with the server/page. Those are the only things I don’t like about it. (Also I never said I disliked it before you tripped out).

item.title: Which of These Templates is Better?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:6, topic:527642”]1: I never said you only take other people’s templates.
2: I never said i dislike you. I don’t know enough about you to have anything other than a neutral feeling.

I stated that I feel as though your design (pictured above) looks retarded and lacks creativity.
I stated before (previous world 901 template) that your work was horrendous and didn’t flow well.

I will continue to say your work is bad until I feel it has gotten better.[/quote]

Instead of coming here, and saying, “Your templates suck” or “You steal others templates” why don’t you try giving positive feedback to help “my suckish templates” since you think they suck.

Read full topic
